name: SimpleSnakeGame
description:
A simple snake in an adventurous world.
Do you take it upon you to guide this snake through his adventures?

The main protagonist of SimpleSnakeGame is Snake. He doesn't really have a nickname, but he doesn't mind. One of the things he does learn about himself is that he likes to go on adventures and see the world.

On itch.io you can download and test the latest development version of SimpleSnakeGame. If you have any feedback you can contact us on our social media channels, or send an email.

@TwinSaberGames

development@twinsaber.com

The versions on itch.io will always be development builds, some better than others. If you want to play the full game you can get it on Steam, once it is released.
